original_title: PAW Patrol: Brave Heroes, Big Rescues
overview: Save the day with 6 huge and heroic rescues of PAW Patrol! EmBARK on two daring double-length adventures as the PAW Patrol transforms into magical Mer-Pups to save underwater friends AND rescues Adventure Bay from a dinosaur invasion! Plus, join the pups as they save Jake, the Adventure Day Parade, a kitty, and even Marshall!
title: PAW Patrol: Brave Heroes, Big Rescues
